hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
export VMNAME="HE-$$" /puppet/jenkins/bin/metacloud.init login /puppet/jenkins/bin/metacloud.init build /puppet/jenkins/bin/metacloud.init start rsyslog2-jessie-small-metacloud /puppet/jenkins/bin/metacloud.init ssh 'wget http://esb3.metacentrum.cz/rsyslog2.git/bootstrap.install.sh && sh -x bootstrap.install.sh' /puppet/jenkins/bin/metacloud.init ssh 'cd /puppet && git checkout wardenb2' ################ /puppet/jenkins/bin/metacloud.init ssh 'cd /puppet && sh phase2.install.sh'
/puppet/jenkins/bin/metacloud.init ssh 'cd /puppet && sh hpucho-web.install.sh' /puppet/jenkins/bin/metacloud.init ssh 'cd /puppet && sh hpucho/tests/web.sh'
/puppet/jenkins/bin/metacloud.init ssh 'cd /puppet && sh hpelastichoney.install.sh' /puppet/jenkins/bin/metacloud.init ssh 'cd /puppet && sh hpelastichoney/tests/hpelastichoney.sh'
